  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameController
    The GameController connects the game logic (Board) with the GUI.
    GameInputProcessor
    This class handles all the keyboard pressing one.
    GameLoopTimer
    This class is the engine for the gravity.
    GameOverPanel
    Game over panel shown when the game ends.
    GameRenderer
    This is the Painter class.
    GameStatsDisplay
    This class is like the scoreboard manager.
    GuiController
    This class handles all the UI things for the Tetris game.
    LevelTracker
    This small class helps us count the progress.
    StartMenuController
    Controller for the start menu screen.
